group_1.textLeft: I abandoned a fellow Magical Girl...
Once again, I witnessed someone become a@Witch before my eyes...

group_1.textRight: If you had intervened during the conflict and@been taken into custody, Sasha-dono,
I believe the situation would have deteriorated@even further than it has,
given that we are more widely recognized than@other Magical Girls thanks to the Festival...

group_1.textLeft: But why did he contact Miura...?

group_1.textRight: It's likely a serious threat against us,@proof of their commitment.
It unmistakably shows the existence of an@eradication group.
You should understand that by reading@the messages...

group_1.narration: We've gathered victims of the Festival and the@avalanche to form an organization, aiming to@drive you Magical Girls out of Yukuni City.
We learned how to identify Magical Girls from@other comrades who hold a grudge against you,@and we found one right away.
Be prepared, because I'm gonna@make you regret this.

group_1.textRight: While on my way to rescue the girl who ended@up becoming a Witch,
I received the initial message,
but by the time I noticed, an additional@message had already arrived.

group_1.narration: The Magical Girl you were hanging out with@at the Festival is here,@so I'm gonna make her an accomplice with@the other girl and have them taken into custody.
We've identified many faces,@Miura's being the most prominent,@and this one is famous for performing@a solo show on the Festival stage.
If you can make her leave, do it.@And then, get the hell out of my town.@That's the first and last act of kindness from me.

group_1.textRight: So this is...what you meant...

group_1.textLeft: It reads like he gave you time because he didn't@really want to hurt you.

group_1.textRight: Indeed, that may be so...
But as we have homes and families, too,
we cannot just simply leave town.

group_1.textLeft: But the situation around us has definitely@gotten worse...

group_1.textRight: Huh...
Hey...kiddo! Hello?!
â€•?!@[wait:0.8][chara:800700:cheek_0][chara:800700:lipSynch_1]You're kidding me... She's dead...?

group_1.textLeft: When a Magical Girl turns into a Witch,@she disappears.
She should be trying to leave Yukuni by now,@leaving only her body behind.
It's good proof that if we corner them,@they'll turn into Witches.

group_1.textRight: If this is how we're getting rid of the Magical@Girls, we'd better hurry and corner them all.
Especially since they're trying to play the good@guy to gain people's trust.
Which means...if we leave them be, there's@gonna be more victims...
We gotta protect them...

group_1.textLeft: Yep, we're gonna smoke out every@Magical Girl in town...

group_1.textRight: I was just trying to find out what happened...@What the hell is going on...with this...

group_1.textCenter: At this rate, they'll turn us all into Witches...
Found her! Go after them and get them!

group_1.textRight: ......[wait:0.8][chara:103501:cheek_0][chara:103501:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:103501:motion_1][chara:103501:eyeClose_1][chara:103501:lipSynch_1]*Sigh*...
Looks like they weren't looking for us...

group_1.textLeft: If we had defeated the Witch back then,@we wouldn't be suffocating like this...

group_1.textRight: No, it's my fault for carelessly revealing myself@at the Festival...

group_1.textLeft: Either way, the frenzied gears are tightening@around us...
